projectGridLines.stationName: MSCI - Real Estate Index Management Research,Mumbai
projectGridLines.title: Project 1  Title: Real Estate Index Management Research
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1

Title: Real Estate Index Management Research


Description: Creation and maintenance of MSCI Real Estate Indexes; Annual representativeness study on Global Real Estate Market Sizes, Develop automation based solution for simulating new product / index research methodologies.


Skill sets: Advanced excel / PowerBI skills, Advanced coding skills (Python/R/SQL), excellent spoken/written communication skills, Proficiency in understanding financial metrics / reports to work on market size research.


Traits expectation: Good communication and reasoning skills; ability to analyze large volumes of data and derive actionable insights from it


Expected learning: Real Estate domain knowledge, Application of programming to real world problems, Solutioning towards enhancement of index quality through tactical IT based tools.


Specific courses required for project execution: A7, B3, B4
